nodes.text: The Office of the Constable was a small building used as a headquarters by the Niima Outpost Militia on Jakku.

The Office of the Constable was a rusty shack on the perimeter of Niima Outpost that served as the headquarters for the Niima Outpost Militia. It contained Constable Zuvio's workstation, an encryption terminal, and a weapons locker. At least two speeders were kept outside of the office.

The Office of the Constable was used as a headquarters by Constable Zuvio, Deputies Drego and Streehn, and the secretary droid CZ-1G5. Drego and Streehn were nearly killed inside the office when Rikard Lovas summoned an attack droid in an attempt to escape questioning.
The Office of the Constable first appeared in the 2015 short story "High Noon on Jakku," which was written by Landry Q. Walker.
